## Description

Stock Market Monytor is a simple dashboard which ables to view daily stock market close prices.
<https://stat-pro.shinyapps.io/stock_market_monytor/>

- You are able to select multiple series and to present them at the same graph.
- The legend of the graph presents symbol of stock inticator and daily close price.
- You are able to select specific area on the graph in order to receive closer view of series.
- By double click you return to initial mode of the graph.

Application code is stored on GitHub.
<https://github.com/makboc/stock_market_monytor#stock_market_monytor>

## Stock Indeces Selection
- Search indeces in search box
- Press SHOW
